channel.title: Help Please?
channel.description:
Hey,
Does anyone know how to completely remove an item off a server? Like once the player logs in & has item either wielded or in inventory. It gets removed.
I have a code on my server but it's only to remove an item from a player & I want to do a mass removal.
Can anyone help?
